notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: R.J.C., Q.G. and M.A. designed the candidate materials, single crystals, and results of characterization. S.B., D.E. and T.K. conceived the ARPES experiments. A.Y., K.K. and J.v.d.B. conducted theoretical studies. S.B., D.E., T.K., M.H., A.F., E.H. and Y.K. carried out ARPES measurements. I.S. and R.S. provided the results of magneto-optical microscopy measurements. S.B. and R.J.C. wrote the paper with the contributions from all the authors.
